biotools.summary: Repository for biomedical ontologies that aims to provide a single point of access to the latest ontology versions. Users can browse the ontologies through the web interface and programatic access is provided via a RESTful API.

bioschemas.name: Ontology Lookup Service
bioschemas.summary: Repository for biomedical ontologies that aims to provide a single point of access to the latest ontology versions. Users can browse the ontologies through the web interface and programatic access is provided via a RESTful API.
